careers
a rewarding career in civil construction

since 1930 kuney construction has earned a reputation for being the go-to heavy civil contractor for challenging projects. our team enjoys using their full set of skills to solve difficult problems on unique projects and have ample opportunity for professional training and development.

the kuney safety program

safety is at the core of everything we do. safety of our employees, owners, the public and the environment. kuney’s safety program emphasizes a continuous cycle of safety education / planning / communication & execution.
